message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could greatly benefit your business. Given its high quality and unique features, I am proposing an initial price of $15000 for the product. This price reflects its exceptional value and the investment we have made into its development. I look forward to discussing this opportunity further with you.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value of your product, I am looking to keep my expenses within a certain budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $12000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your pricing strategy.
